00020 #include "llist.h"
00021 
00022 namespace CasPlanner
00023 {
00025 Node * LList::GetHead()
00026 {
00027         return this->Start;
00028 };
00030 void LList::Next()
00031 {
00032         Start = Start->next;
00033         if(Start != NULL)
00034                 Start->prev = NULL;
00035 };
00037 void LList::Prev()
00038 {
00039         Start = Start->prev;
00040 };
00042 Node * LList::Find(Node * q)
00043 {
00044         Node *p = Start;
00045         while (p)
00046         {
00047                 if(*q==*p)
00048                 {
00049                         return p;
00050                         //qDebug("Yes It works :)");
00051                 }
00052                 p = p->next;                            
00053         }
00054         return NULL;
00055 };
00057 LList::LList()
00058 {
00059         Start = NULL;
00060 };
00062 LList::~LList()
00063 {
00064         Node *p;
00065         while (Start != NULL)
00066         {
00067                 p = Start->next;
00068                 delete Start;
00069                 Start = p;
00070         }               
00071 };
00073 void LList::Free()
00074 {
00075         Node *p;
00076         while (Start != NULL)
00077         {
00078                 //cout <<"\n    --->>> Freeing Node <<<---"; fflush(stdout);
00079                 p = Start->next;
00080                 delete Start;
00081                 Start = p;
00082         }               
00083 };
00085 void LList::Add(Node * curChild)
00086 {
00087         Node * p,* q ;
00088         p = this->Start;
00089         q = p;
00090         // now insert the child into the open list according to the f value
00091         while (p) 
00092         {
00093                 // insert before p, sorted ascending
00094                 if (p->f_value >= curChild->f_value)           
00095                 {
00096                         // test head of the list case
00097                         if (p == Start)
00098                                 Start = curChild;
00099                         curChild->next = p;
00100                         curChild->prev = p->prev;
00101                         p->prev = curChild;
00102                         if (curChild->prev)
00103                                 (curChild->prev)->next = curChild;
00104                         break;
00105                 }
00106                 q = p;
00107                 p = p->next;
00108         }               
00109         if (p == NULL)       
00110         {
00111                 if (q != NULL) // insert at the end
00112                 {
00113                 q->next = curChild;
00114                         curChild->prev = q;
00115                         curChild->next = NULL;
00116                 }
00117                 else          // insert at the beginning
00118                 {
00119                         Start = curChild;
00120                         curChild->prev = NULL;
00121                 }
00122         }                       
00123         //cout <<"\n    --->>> Node Added Successfully <<<---"; fflush(stdout);
00124 };
00126 bool LList::Remove(Node *q)
00127 {
00128         Node *p;
00129         p = Start;
00130         while (p)
00131         {
00132                 if(*q==*p)
00133                         {
00134                                 //qDebug("I actually removed something");
00135                                 if (p->prev != NULL)            
00136                                 (p->prev)->next = p->next;
00137                                 if (p->next != NULL)            
00138                                         (p->next)->prev = p->prev;                                                              
00139                                 if (p == Start)
00140                                         Start = p->next;
00141                                 delete p;
00142                                 return 1;
00143                         }
00144                 p = p->next;
00145         }
00146         return 0;       
00147 };
00149 void LList::Print()
00150 {
00151         Node *p;
00152         int i=0;
00153         p = Start;
00154         while(p)
00155         {
00156                 cout<<"\n Node["<<++i<<"] X="<<p->pose.p.x()<<" Y="<<p->pose.p.y();
00157                 p = p->next;
00158         }
00159 };
00160 }
